actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to study certain lands in the Sierra National Forest, Calif., for possible inclusion in the national wilderness preservation system.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to review specified lands in the Sierra National Forest, California, for possible inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation System. Authorizes to be appropriated such amount as necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to study certain lands in the Sierra National Forest, Calif., for possible inclusion in the national wilderness preservation system.
